SELECT psd.product_sell_daily_id, psd.create_time, psd.total, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, p.product_id, p.product_name FROM tb_product_sell_daily psd, tb_shop s, tb_product p
s.shop_id = psd.shop_id AND p.product_id = psd.product_id /*按店铺查询*/
AND s.shop_id = #{productSellDaily.shop.shopId}
/*按商品名模糊查询*/
AND p.product_name like '%${productSellDaily.product.productName}%'
AND date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between data_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and data_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= data_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= data_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'
order by psd.product_id,psd.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily ( SELECT product_id,shop_id,data_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),count(product_id)AS total FROM tb_user_product_map WHERE date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day ) GROUP BY product_id )

INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily(product_id, shop_id, create_time,total) ( SELECT p.product_id,p.shop_id,data_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day ),0 AS total FROM tb_product p WHERE p.product_id not in (select product_id from tb_product_sell_daily where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')= data_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) )
